resources.string: Dear visitor, welcome to Al-Ahsa Oasis
One of the greatest cities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and its famous green oases
In this application, visitors will discover the most important areas and monuments in the Al-Ahsa Oasis
The application includes tourist hotels and the most important educational schools and universities
Most of the popular locations that have the top demand in town at the moment!
ScrapYard is the best rated restaurant in the location at the moment.
Chapter7 is the best rated club in the location at the moment.

Imam Muhammad Bin Saud Islamic University
A historical market located in Al-Ahsa, eastern Saudi Arabia
The popular village markets is the largest commercial market in Al-Ahsa Governorate, containing 1,500 commercial units of various modern and old activities
It is one of the most famous markets in the city of Hofuf, and is characterized by its excellent and close location in the Al-Rafa neighborhood
It is one of the largest single-storey complexes, characterized by its family atmosphere, and contains many shops, restaurants and cafes .
One of the largest malls in Al-Ahsa with an area of ​​30 thousand square meters. It consists of two floors containing many shops and restaurants.
Farm Superstores is one of the leading trading, retail and import companies.
A place that understands your needs and deserves your journey, an ideal destination for shopping and entertainment.
Uqair Beach is the best rated Beach in Al-Ahsa\'a at the moment.
From the breathtaking summit of Al Qarah Mountain, Arabic translations of the surrounding region’s place names bring new meaning.

Al-Asfar Lake is a lake located in Al-Omran east of Al-Ahsa in Saudi Arabia. It is considered the largest watershed in the Gulf region, and it is the only one in the Kingdom of its kind in which an integrated wildlife lives.

The city of Jawatha is a historic treasure of the Kingdom, because it was once a palace or fortress used by Abd al-Qays, Bahrain. It was mentioned in the Book of the Status of the Arabian Island, settled by nations for the rich eyes and fertility of its agricultural soil.

Jabal Al-Arbaa is a wonderful rock formation located in south Al-Hofuf and is one of the well-known group of mountains in Al-Ahsa. It is named after its four conical shaped plateaus, two joined together and the other two separate from each other.
Al-Shu\'ba mountain located in east of Al-Shu\'ba village at Al-Ahsa and to the north of Al-Eskan next to the road leading from eastern villages to the northern villages and to Al-Dammam.
Located in the southern part of Al Hofuf, King Abdullah Environmental Park is one of the best amusement options in this region.

Al-Tharf Model Garden or Al-Ahsa Zoo is a park that includes many animals located in Al-Ahsa Governorate in the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia. The park is also one of Al-Ahsa’s tourist attractions.

The House of Allegiance or House of Allegiance is a historical house located in the Al Kut neighborhood of Al Hofuf Al Ahsa’iya city, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It is the house of Abdul Latif bin Abdul Rahman Al-Mulla, the head of the Al-Mulla family, and the house of the one who witnessed the people of Al-Ahsa pledge allegiance to King Abdul Aziz and their accession to the Saudi state in 1913.
The Ibrahim Palace was built during the time of the first Saudi state and is considered to be an architectural masterpiece.
Sahood Fort is situated outside the western walls of Al Mubarraz, Saudi Arabia. The fort is used as barracks for the Saudi Arabian Armed Forces.
Uqair is the site of numerous historic meetings between the founding king and foreign diplomats and the place in which he conducted negotiations with international political forces in the region.

The Princes School, the House of Culture, or the First Hofuf School is one of the oldest public schools in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia,Its construction began in 1937 and was officially opened in February 1941.
Muhairis Palace is a palace built by Imam Saud bin Abdul Aziz on the top of a hill in 1208 AH for military purposes.

Khuzam Palace is located in the east of Al-Raqeqa neighborhood (currently Al-Mazrou’iya) located west of the city of Hofuf. It is the seat of the Bedouin residents who go to Al-Ahsa in the summer seasons for two months to exchange goods available in Al-Ahsa such as dates, sugar, some textiles, guns, ammunition and others for the goods they brought from the desert.
"Here, you will definitely see and explore unique tourism "

King Faisal University was established on 7/28/1395 AH (1975 AD), University colleges: College of Medicine, College of Business Administration, College of Computer Science and Information Technology, College of Engineering, College of Arts, College of Law and College of Clinical Pharmacy, and others.
The College of Sharia and Islamic Studies in Al-Ahsa is one of the branches of Imam Muhammad bin Saud Islamic University. The College of Sharia in Al-Ahsa was established in the year 1400 AH.

It is a university specialized in health sciences and has the accreditation of the Ministry of Education in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for its various programs for the undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

It is a non-profit, regional Arab university. Its idea emerged from its founder, Prince Talal bin Abdulaziz, when he announced in 1996 his initiative to establish an Arab Open University as a non-traditional academic entity.

It is a state of the art institute that inspires passion for training excellence, world-class training programs. It is the result of a strategic partnership between Saudi Aramco (SA) and the Technical and Vocational Training Corporation (TVTC).

The college mainly focuses on technical and vocational training to prepare students for careers. It is governed by the Technical and Vocational Training Corporation, the government provider of training in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
The activity of the Gulf Training and Education Company is to provide training courses in the fields of English language, computer science, information technology and management sciences.
Wall Street Style is a mix of language teaching methods, offering interactive lessons with traditional classes, native language teachers, and fun activities.

Schools started their activities in the academic year 1985/1986 with a small number of students that did not exceed 200 students, and by the end of the academic year the total number of students in schools reached 500 students.

Providing high quality educational services through an educational structure that enhances students opportunities in cooperative education and communication through optimal use of modern technology and community participation.
Triple Tree offers accommodation in Al Hofuf. This property features free WiFi, a supermarket and a car rental service.
Located in Hofuf, 8 km from Al Ahsa, Linah Houses Furnished Units provides a shared lounge and free WiFi. Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a fireplace, and a seating area
Al Koot Heritage Hotel is a 4-star property located in Hofuf. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant and a 24-hour front desk
Upscale, contemporary rooms feature free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, as well as kitchenettes and coffee and tea makers. In addition to the above, the suites have separate living and dining rooms
Al Ahsa InterContinental is an elegant 5-star hotel located in Al Ahsa in the business and shopping district of Hofuf, ideal for business and leisure travelers.
Al-Ahsa Grand Hotel ... a 21st century hotel that raises the offerings of Al-Hofuf, Al-Ahsa Hotel, Conference, Meeting and Wedding Market to the international level. The tower consists of 15 floors
Discover a new world of warmth and a vibrant atmosphere at Coral Al Ahsa Hotel
Free Wi-Fi and parking are offered in the aparthotel, and there is also a dry cleaning service. All rooms include kitchenettes and LCD TVs
Taleen Al Sulaimanyah also offers many facilities to enrich your stay. The hotel provides a family room, coffee shop, safety deposit boxes
Garden Plaza Hotel is located in Hofuf and in the center of Al Ahsa. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site
An American restaurant in Al-Ahsa that specializes in making steak the way you like it and offers the finest types of burgers and steaks and a suitable place to meet family and friends
Al-Ahsa Steak Restaurant is a restaurant specialized in selling the most delicious meat with the presence of a chef specialized in the field
Al-Kit Restaurant is one of the most famous restaurants in Al-Ahsa offering fresh seafood, with a suitable place for families and individuals

A restaurant that specializes in serving the most delicious Italian dishes and is distinguished by providing fresh ingredients in a modern way. It is considered one of the best Italian restaurants in Al-Ahsa
Lava Restaurant in Al-Ahsa is famous for serving a variety of dishes while maintaining the quality of the food served. The design of the place is modern and attractive for visitors to enjoy.
One of the most famous cafes in Al-Ahsa serves cold and hot drinks with the most delicious donuts you will eat.
Bharat Restaurant in Al-Ahsa offers the most delicious Indian food with a modern design that suits everyone
One of the most famous restaurants that serve steak with burger with the seafood order service available in the restaurant
One of the oldest restaurants in Al-Ahsa, it is characterized by a variety of delicious dishes and is characterized by a wonderful modern design
khaibar Restaurant in Al-Ahsa is characterized by its traditional cuisine with beautiful traditional design
